steps.intro: To begin, you'll have to fight enemies. A battle will begin as soon as you click here.
During a battle, use the 'Attack' button for extras attacks as quick as you click.
If you don't feel you can win, you can escape the battle by clicking here.
Here is your HPs, you'll die if you end at 0.
Remember, you can restore your HPs if it goes dangerously down.
